23/* The following include will do 2 things: include the config.h
24 if there is one (as it may define MPFR_USE_MINI_GMP), and avoid
25 an empty translation unit (see ISO C99, 6.9). */
26#include "mpfr-impl.h"
27
28#ifdef MPFR_USE_MINI_GMP
29
30#include "mpfr-mini-gmp.h"
31
32/************************ random generation functions ************************/
33
34#ifdef WANT_gmp_randinit_default
35void
36gmp_randinit_default (gmp_randstate_t state)
37{
38}
39#endif
40
41#ifdef WANT_gmp_randseed_ui
42void
43gmp_randseed_ui (gmp_randstate_t state, unsigned long int seed)
44{
45 srand48 (seed);
46}
47#endif
48
49#ifdef WANT_gmp_randclear
50void
51gmp_randclear (gmp_randstate_t state)
52{
53}
54#endif
55
56#ifdef WANT_gmp_randinit_set
57void
58gmp_randinit_set (gmp_randstate_t s1, gmp_randstate_t s2)
59{
60}
61#endif
62
63static mp_limb_t
64random_limb (void)
65{
66 /* lrand48() only gives 31 bits */
67#if GMP_NUMB_BITS == 32
68 return lrand48 () + (lrand48 () << 31);
69#else
70 return lrand48 () + (((mp_limb_t) lrand48 ()) << 31)
71 + (((mp_limb_t) lrand48 ()) << 62);
72#endif
73}
74
75#ifdef WANT_mpz_urandomb
76void
77mpz_urandomb (mpz_t rop, gmp_randstate_t state, mp_bitcnt_t nbits)
78{
79 unsigned long n, i;
80
81 mpz_realloc2 (rop, nbits);
82 n = (nbits - 1) / GMP_NUMB_BITS + 1; /* number of limbs */
83 for (i = n; i-- > 0;)
84 rop->_mp_d[i] = random_limb ();
85 i = n * GMP_NUMB_BITS - nbits;
86 /* mask the upper i bits */
87 if (i)
88 rop->_mp_d[n-1] = (rop->_mp_d[n-1] << i) >> i;
89 while (n > 0 && (rop->_mp_d[n-1] == 0))
90 n--;
91 rop->_mp_size = n;
92}
93#endif
94
95#ifdef WANT_gmp_urandomm_ui
96unsigned long
97gmp_urandomm_ui (gmp_randstate_t state, unsigned long n)
98{
99 return random_limb () % n;
100}
101#endif
102
103#ifdef WANT_gmp_urandomb_ui
104unsigned long
105gmp_urandomb_ui (gmp_randstate_t state, unsigned long n)
106{
107 return random_limb () % (1UL << n);
108}
109#endif
110
111/************************* division functions ********************************/
112
113#ifdef WANT_mpn_divrem_1
114mp_limb_t
115mpn_divrem_1 (mp_limb_t *qp, mp_size_t qxn, mp_limb_t *np, mp_size_t nn,
116 mp_limb_t d0)
117{
118 mpz_t q, r, n, d;
119 mp_limb_t ret, dd[1];
120
121 d->_mp_d = dd;
122 d->_mp_d[0] = d0;
123 d->_mp_size = 1;
124 mpz_init (q);
125 mpz_init (r);
126 if (qxn == 0)
127 {
128 n->_mp_d = np;
129 n->_mp_size = nn;
130 }
131 else
132 {
133 mpz_init2 (n, (nn + qxn) * GMP_NUMB_BITS);
134 mpn_copyi (n->_mp_d + qxn, np, nn);
135 mpn_zero (n->_mp_d, qxn);
136 n->_mp_size = nn + qxn;
137 }
138 mpz_tdiv_qr (q, r, n, d);
139 if (q->_mp_size > 0)
140 mpn_copyi (qp, q->_mp_d, q->_mp_size);
141 if (q->_mp_size < nn + qxn)
142 mpn_zero (qp + q->_mp_size, nn + qxn - q->_mp_size);
143 ret = (r->_mp_size == 1) ? r->_mp_d[0] : 0;
144 mpz_clear (q);
145 mpz_clear (r);
146 if (qxn != 0)
147 mpz_clear (n);
148 return ret;
149}
150#endif
151
152#ifdef WANT_mpn_divrem
153mp_limb_t
154mpn_divrem (mp_limb_t *qp, mp_size_t qn, mp_limb_t *np,
155 mp_size_t nn, const mp_limb_t *dp, mp_size_t dn)
156{
157 mpz_t q, r, n, d;
158 mp_limb_t ret;
159
160 MPFR_ASSERTN(qn == 0);
161 qn = nn - dn;
162 n->_mp_d = np;
163 n->_mp_size = nn;
164 d->_mp_d = (mp_limb_t*) dp;
165 d->_mp_size = dn;
166 mpz_init (q);
167 mpz_init (r);
168 mpz_tdiv_qr (q, r, n, d);
169 MPFR_ASSERTN(q->_mp_size == qn || q->_mp_size == qn + 1);
170 mpn_copyi (qp, q->_mp_d, qn);
171 ret = (q->_mp_size == qn) ? 0 : q->_mp_d[qn];
172 if (r->_mp_size > 0)
173 mpn_copyi (np, r->_mp_d, r->_mp_size);
174 if (r->_mp_size < dn)
175 mpn_zero (np + r->_mp_size, dn - r->_mp_size);
176 mpz_clear (q);
177 mpz_clear (r);
178 return ret;
179}
180#endif
181
182#ifdef WANT_mpn_tdiv_qr
183void
184mpn_tdiv_qr (mp_limb_t *qp, mp_limb_t *rp, mp_size_t qxn,
185 const mp_limb_t *np, mp_size_t nn,
186 const mp_limb_t *dp, mp_size_t dn)
187{
188 mpz_t q, r, n, d;
189
190 MPFR_ASSERTN(qxn == 0);
191 n->_mp_d = (mp_limb_t*) np;
192 n->_mp_size = nn;
193 d->_mp_d = (mp_limb_t*) dp;
194 d->_mp_size = dn;
195 mpz_init (q);
196 mpz_init (r);
197 mpz_tdiv_qr (q, r, n, d);
198 MPFR_ASSERTN(q->_mp_size > 0);
199 mpn_copyi (qp, q->_mp_d, q->_mp_size);
200 if (q->_mp_size < nn - dn + 1)
201 mpn_zero (qp + q->_mp_size, nn - dn + 1 - q->_mp_size);
202 if (r->_mp_size > 0)
203 mpn_copyi (rp, r->_mp_d, r->_mp_size);
204 if (r->_mp_size < dn)
205 mpn_zero (rp + r->_mp_size, dn - r->_mp_size);
206 mpz_clear (q);
207 mpz_clear (r);
208}
209#endif
210
211#endif /* MPFR_USE_MINI_GMP */
